source.804bb23f:
### Performing Simple AutoML Task with [PyCaret Library](https://pycaret.org) PyCaret is low code fully open source automatic machine learning library which helps from
data preparation to final model deployment in every mode of learning i.e Supervised, Unsupervised
or Clustering.
source.0644f42e: Rather fitting dataset individually to every ML algorithm, Pycaret gives feature to compare between them directly.
source.1a864613: Finding null columns though PyCaret manages to fill null values
source.17f25ca1: As 'casual' and 'registered' are extra columns which are not present in test set so droping them
source.8f7eec53: From above cell the number of featuers PyCaret is providing for just feature engineering can be seen.
source.8854dc8b:
Comparing models with each other can be the best possible feature of AutoML where time efficiency can be obtained.
After this hyperparameter tuning can also be done to that particular best performed model or even of top selects, this all
may a downhill if there is lack of high end GPU support. ### [To know more about other types of AutoML and how it works.](https://www.kaggle.com/learn-forum/176447)
